name: classwrap
description: 0.3 KB JavaScript utility for conditionally concatenating class names.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/classwrap.js -o dist/classwrap.js --mangle --compress warnings=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty -p relative --source-map dist/classwrap.js.map
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
